MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the G23 postcode area of Glasgow affecting properties in Mullardoch Street. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to safely complete repairs, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:30am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:47am on Tuesday, 09 February 2021
